name: It's the Great Pumpkin
description:
Hello everyone, this game was inspired by Dave Microwaves Games and his low-poly style. I hope you enjoy this game as much as I did making it.

You are Charlie Brown.
You're searching for your
friend, Linus. Last night, he attended his yearly tradition of searching for the Great Pumpkin. You believe that it's silly and you're only there to tell Linus that. Better watch out....

The Great Pumpkin is very real.
